history.content: Definitely yes. Otherwise you'll lose the chance to declare your minor.

For the situation such that when this semester is the one before our last semester, and we are not sure whether we can declare cs as a major or not, then if we cannot declare as a major, but still want to declare as a minor, should we submit both applications of major and minor now? since we must declare minor 1 semester before graduation for students graduating Fall 2020 or later.
history.subject: Major and minor

history.content: For the situation such that when this semester is the one before our last semester, and we are not sure whether we can declare cs as a major or not, but if we cannot declare as a major, but still want to declare as a minor, should we submit both applications of major and minor now? since we must declare minor 1 semester before graduation for students graduating Fall 2020 or later.
